data.text: PLAY GO RIDE & WIN REAL CASH
Fantastic Online Racing Game to Win Money
Fantastic Online Racing Game to Win Money
Play over 60+ Games and Win Cash!

description: Go Ride is a bike racing game. The objective is to go as far as you can without crashing. You score points based on the distance you cover at a high speed. Riding at slower speeds doesn't get you any point. You get more points for riding fast and narrowly avoiding colliding with vehicles on the road.

There is no time limit and the game ends only when your motorcycle crashes. Go Ride is an online racing game that you will definitely want to play again and again! This game is available exclusively on the vpl platform and you can earn real cash by competing with other online Go Ride players.

Go Ride is a bike racing game. The objective is to go as far as you can without crashing. You score points based on the distance you cover at a high speed. Riding at slower speeds doesn't get you any point.

data.header: Features of the Go Ride game

description: You can move left or right by sivply tilting your phone in the direction you wish to go. You can slow down by pressing the brake button.

data.header: How to play Go Ride Game on vpl

content: In the vpl app, select the Go Ride game and you will be able to see the list of battles and tournaments.
Select and join a tournament or battle of your choice. Once the fee has been deducted, you can start playing the vpl game.
You can play as many times as you want to get the best possible score while the tournament is on. The winners are rewarded as per the final ranking once the tournament has ended.

description: The game begins with a countdown, and you need to be ready, because the bike starts moving forward at once. As mentioned earlier, you need to tilt your phone to move left or right. Maintaining a high speed is ideal. Going slow will not earn you any points. There is a brake button on the left hand side of the screen which can be used to slow down in case you are going too fast or you want to dodge any vehicles safely. Ride carefully! Even a slight error can result in a crash and end the game.

The farther you drive, the more points you will score. When you closely pass by an oncoming vehicle, you get 20 points. Going too slow will not fetch you any points. Performing a ‘near miss’ stunt earns you 40 extra points. Your total score is determined by your speed and the time spent on the road.

data.header: Steps to play Go Ride on vpl

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.info: Tilt the phone to turn left/right

steps.title: STEP 2
steps.info: Press the brake button to slow down

steps.title: STEP 3
steps.info: Ride as far you can to increase your score

steps.title: STEP 4
steps.info: You will not score any points if your speed is too slow

steps.title: STEP 5
steps.info: Clear consecutive layers to get multipliers

steps.title: STEP 1
steps.info: Tilt the phone to turn left/right

data.header: The Go Ride Game will end if

description: You crash your bike. This will cause the game to end instantly. Remember to keep your eyes on the road and ride safe in real life!
The game supports only the tournament format. In this format, the players must try to register the best high score by the time the tournament ends.

data.header: The Maximum Amount Players can Win

description: On a typical day, there are players who win more than ₹10,000 per day in Go Ride. It is possible for skilled players to win more than ₹15,000 to ₹20,000 per day as well.

content.name: How do I control the speed of my bike if a vehicle suddenly appears?
description: Press the brake button at the bottom left of the game screen to slow your motorcycle down.
